#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
    int a=0,b=0,r,c,n=0,ct=0;
    char e[100][100];
    while(cin>>r>>c){
           if(r==0 && c==0)
                   break;
           else 
                n++;
    for(a=0;a<r;a++)
                    cin>>e[a];
    for(a=0;a<r;a++)
                    for(b=0;b<c;b++){
                                    ct=0;
                                    if(e[a][b]=='*')
                                                     continue;
                                    else{
                                        if(e[a][b-1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a-1][b]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a-1][b+1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a][b+1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a+1][b+1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a+1][b]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a+1][b-1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        if(e[a-1][b-1]=='*')
                                                              ct++;
                                        ct+=48;                  
                                        e[a][b]=(char)(ct);
                                    }
                    }
        cout<<"Field #"<<n<<":"<<endl;
        for(a=0;a<r;a++){
                    for(b=0;b<c;b++){
                                    cout<<e[a][b];
                                    }
                    cout<<endl;
        }
        if(r!=0 && c!=0)
                cout<<endl;
    }
        return 0;
}
